org.dockbox.selene.api

Class SeleneBootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dockbox.selene.di.InjectableBootstrap
      • org.dockbox.selene.api.SeleneBootstrap
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SeleneModuleBootstrap

    public abstract class SeleneBootstrap
extends InjectableBootstrap
    The global bootstrapping component which instantiates all configured modules and provides access to server information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      protected SeleneBootstrap(InjectConfiguration early, InjectConfiguration late)
      Instantiates Selene, creating a local injector based on the provided InjectConfiguration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SeleneBootstrap

        protected SeleneBootstrap(InjectConfiguration early,
                          InjectConfiguration late)
        Instantiates Selene, creating a local injector based on the provided InjectConfiguration. Also verifies dependency artifacts and injector bindings. Proceeds to construct() once verified.
        Parameters:
        early - the injector provided by the Selene implementation

    • Method Detail

      • construct

        protected void construct()
        Loads various properties from selene.properties, including the latest update and version. Once done sets the static instance equal to this instance.

      • init

        protected void init()
        Initiates a Selene instance. Collecting integrated modules and registering them to the appropriate instances where required.
